title: How to Make 3 Ingredient, Healthy Chocolate Bars in Under 5 Minutes

steps.headline: Measure out 4 tablespoons of coconut oil.
steps.description: Add 1/2 cup of cocoa powder and place in the microwave for 60 seconds. Mix with an electric mixer to remove all clumps of cocoa powder from the mixture.

steps.headline: Add stevia drops to taste and mix the chocolate mixture again.
steps.description: Pour the mixture onto the cookie sheet, using a spatula to scrape out all the excess. Place in the freezer for 3 minutes. You may wish to crush other candy or embellishments on the chocolate while it is still melted.

steps.headline: After three minutes of waiting, cut up the flattened chocolate into desired size of bars.
steps.description: For chocolate chips or chocolate curls, you may wish to finely chop the chocolate from the sheet, then place in a small glass jar.

text: Measure out 4 tablespoons of coconut oil. Add 1/2 cup of cocoa powder and place in the microwave for 60 seconds. Mix with an electric mixer to remove all clumps of cocoa powder from the mixture. Add stevia drops to taste and mix the chocolate mixture again. Pour the mixture onto the cookie sheet, using a spatula to scrape out all the excess. Place in the freezer for 3 minutes. You may wish to crush other candy or embellishments on the chocolate while it is still melted. After three minutes of waiting, cut up the flattened chocolate into desired size of bars. For chocolate chips or chocolate curls, you may wish to finely chop the chocolate from the sheet, then place in a small glass jar.
